name: Sticky Situation (Hardcore Budget)
description:
Both characters must reach the chest together!

You can use the UI or Press:

Right and left arrow keys to move the characters.

Spacebar to jump.

Up arrow key to open chest.

R to reset level.

Esc to pause.

Control both players at the same time while using the surrounding environment to help them stick or split depending on the situation. Challenge your brain and try to beat all 20 levels!

Art:

Some UI icons are by anjuP & redaxy on freeicons.io .

All remaining sprites are by Pixel Frog, NicoPardo, old_flick, and raimundoNC on itch.io .

Music:

 "Small Adventurers" by Shady Dave on freesound.org .
